The course was well organized to facilitate student learning

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments:
I've improved my oral English, especially the pronunciation.
Also, I became more confident when making a presentation to the whole class, which was a breakthrough for me.
Having confidence to speak English, presentation skills

Im better at giving a speech in front of classmates and teachers.
My instructor also helped me with my pronunciation.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments:
Strengths: Everyone was encouraged to speak out and all the mistakes could be pointed out accurately and immediately.
Weaknesses: More listening trainings are supposed to be provided.

Strengths-We can do presentation about what we are interested in.

Weakness- nothing

In this course, every students is able to take part in the conversation and the topic.
I feel more confident to speak in front of people.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments:
I highly recommend this course.
I enjoyed the atmosphere of the class. Everyone could voice his/her opinion at ease. The presentations made by students from all over the world totally broadened my horizons.

Yes.
I can have the confidence to do presentation in English
Its a great course for us to challenge ourselves. We are able to have an excellent class environment. Everyone here is enthusiastic and we can learn how to make a better speech here.
